issue.title: Change MapD to OmniSci on Powered By page
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3551](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3551). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
MapD recently changed its name to OmniSci. We should update the Powered By page to reflect this.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3551?focusedCommentId=16655282) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
